snippet.title: Alternate-History WW2 Needs YOU: Grit and Valor 1949 Demo Trailer!
snippet.description:
Axis powers dominate Europe and the last hope lies in your hands. Will YOU lead the resistance?

Grit and Valor – 1949 is a real-time tactics roguelike set in an alternate-history WW2. Use clever strategy and squad upgrades to overcome the enemy.

💥 Customizable Mechs & Pilots: Design and upgrade your squad to take on the most brutal missions. Try unique combinations of Mechs and Pilots to tailor your strategy to ever-changing battlefields.

⚔️ Wave-Based Tactical Combat: Face relentless waves of enemies and deal with ruthless hazards in intense missions. Each level brings a new challenge, with epic boss battles awaiting at the end of every region.

🔧 Endless Replayability: No two runs are ever the same. Build your team, experiment with different strategies, and face off against unpredictable challenges. Every decision matters.

🚀 Download the demo today and experience the thrill of Grit and Valor – 1949. Your tactical brilliance will determine the future of the world!

👇 Follow us on Steam and join the fight!
https://store.steampowered.com/app/1911860/Grit_and_Valor__1949/

👾 Join our community for updates and more!
https://discord.gg/8eqDpa88nf
